name: The Legend of the Chasse-Nite
description:
According to Legends, by a cold and unconnected night, some kids made an arrangements with a strange man to get back to their computer to play Nortnite. This is the story of their fate.

A game jam game under the theme of : Urban Legends

Made by :  Julie Fiala, Lindsay Munro, Alexandre Lessard, Richard Rail, Daniel Major, Jacinta Van Den Bussche

INSTRUCTION : 

You need 1 to 4 ps4 controlers and love.
